tool.name: SAGA.imagery_classification.1
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRIDS True output_data_CLUSTER $output_data_CLUSTER output_data_STATISTICS $output_data_STATISTICS name SAGA.imagery_classification.1 GRIDS $GRIDS METHOD $METHOD NCLUSTER $NCLUSTER MAXITER $MAXITER NORMALISE $NORMALISE RGB_COLORS $RGB_COLORS INITIALIZE $INITIALIZE OLDVERSION $OLDVERSION UPDATEVIEW $UPDATEVIEW prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CLUSTER $OutputSection_CLUSTER.outputType_CLUSTER transmissionMode_CLUSTER $OutputSection_CLUSTER.transmissionMode_CLUSTER outputType_STATISTICS $OutputSection_STATISTICS.outputType_STATISTICS transmissionMode_STATISTICS $OutputSection_STATISTICS.transmissionMode_STATISTICS

param.name: GRIDS
param.label: Grids
param.help: Grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: MAXITER
param.label: Maximum Iterations
param.help: maximum number of iterations, ignored if set to zero (default)

param.name: NORMALISE
param.label: Normalise
param.help: Automatically normalise grids by standard deviation before clustering.

param.name: RGB_COLORS
param.label: Update Colors from Features
param.help: Use the first three features in list to obtain blue, green, red components for class colour in look-up table.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CLUSTER
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_STATISTICS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: This tool implements the K-Means cluster analysis for grids in two variants, iterative minimum distance (Forgy 1965) and hill climbing (Rubin 1967).
